mapper.select: select mem_id from member where mem_id=#{mem_id} and mem_pwd=#{mem_pwd}
select mem_name from member where mem_id=#{mem_id} and mem_pwd=#{mem_pwd}
select mem_pwd from member where mem_id=#{mem_id} and mem_email=#{mem_email}
select o.orderid, o.item_key_sub, o.agegroup, o.orderdate, o.deposit, p.item_name, o.totprice from package p, orders o where p.item_key = o.item_key and o.mem_id=#{mem_id}
select qna_number,mem_id, qna_title, qna_date from qna where mem_id =#{mem_id}
select mem_id, mem_pwd,mem_name,mem_email,mem_phone from member where mem_id=#{mem_id}
select count(*) from member where mem_id=#{mem_id}
select * from package where intro_text like #{intro_text}

select rownum, a.* from (select distinct p.item_name, p.price from orders o,package p where o.mem_id in (select o.mem_id from orders o,package p where p.item_key =#{item_key} and o.mem_id!=#{mem_id}) and p.item_key not in(select item_key from orders where mem_id=#{mem_id})) a where rownum between 1 and 4
select item_key from orders where mem_id=#{mem_id}
